component.name: Field
component.description: Provide semantic structure, labeling, validation, and layout for a single form control.

useCases: Wrapping any form control with a label
Displaying validation errors for an input
Adding helper or descriptive text to an input
Controlling layout orientation of label-input pairs
Building complete forms with FieldSet and FieldGroup

commonPatterns.name: vertical-field
commonPatterns.composition:
<Field>
  <FieldLabel htmlFor="name">Name</FieldLabel>
  <Input id="name" placeholder="Enter name" />
  <FieldDescription>Your full legal name.</FieldDescription>
</Field>

commonPatterns.name: horizontal-field
commonPatterns.description: Side-by-side label and input for compact forms

commonPatterns.name: responsive-field
commonPatterns.description: Stacks vertically on small screens, horizontal on wider containers

commonPatterns.name: field-with-error
commonPatterns.composition:
<Field data-invalid="true">
  <FieldLabel htmlFor="email">Email</FieldLabel>
  <Input id="email" aria-invalid="true" />
  <FieldError>Please enter a valid email address.</FieldError>
</Field>

commonPatterns.name: field-with-error-objects
commonPatterns.description: Error component accepting an array of error objects (e.g., from react-hook-form)
commonPatterns.composition: <FieldError errors={[{ message: 'Required' }, { message: 'Must be at least 3 characters' }]} />

commonPatterns.name: checkbox-field
commonPatterns.description: Checkbox with label and optional description
commonPatterns.composition:
<Field orientation="horizontal">
  <Checkbox id="terms" />
  <FieldContent>
    <FieldLabel htmlFor="terms">Accept terms</FieldLabel>
    <FieldDescription>You agree to our Terms of Service.</FieldDescription>
  </FieldContent>
</Field>

commonPatterns.name: field-group
commonPatterns.description: Multiple fields grouped together in a form section
commonPatterns.composition:
<FieldSet>
  <FieldLegend>Personal Information</FieldLegend>
  <FieldGroup>
    <Field>
      <FieldLabel htmlFor="first">First Name</FieldLabel>
      <Input id="first" />
    </Field>
    <Field>
      <FieldLabel htmlFor="last">Last Name</FieldLabel>
      <Input id="last" />
    </Field>
  </FieldGroup>
</FieldSet>

commonPatterns.name: field-with-separator
commonPatterns.description: Visual separator between fields, optionally with text

antiPatterns.reason: Field is for form controls; read-only display does not need form semantics
antiPatterns.alternative: Use plain text or display components

antiPatterns.scenario: Ephemeral inline controls with no semantic meaning
antiPatterns.reason: Lightweight inline interactions do not require the overhead of Field structure
antiPatterns.alternative: Use the control directly without Field wrapping

antiPatterns.scenario: Putting validation logic directly on Input
antiPatterns.reason: Validation display belongs to Field, not the input primitive
antiPatterns.alternative: Use FieldError inside Field for validation messages

legendVariant.description: Controls the visual size of FieldLegend text

subComponents.Field: Wrapper for a single logical control with label, description, and error slots; renders role=group
subComponents.FieldLabel: Wraps Label component; visually styled as muted text; includes disabled opacity support
subComponents.FieldTitle: Bold inline label alternative for non-clickable headings within a Field
subComponents.FieldDescription: Helper text rendered as a paragraph below or beside the control
subComponents.FieldError: Validation error display; accepts children or an errors array of { message } objects; renders role=alert
subComponents.FieldContent: Flex column wrapper for pairing label + description beside a checkbox or radio
subComponents.FieldSeparator: Horizontal rule between fields; optionally displays centered text like 'or'
subComponents.FieldGroup: Container for multiple fields; manages spacing and container queries for responsive orientation
subComponents.FieldSet: Semantic fieldset element; groups related fields with FieldLegend
subComponents.FieldLegend: Semantic legend for a FieldSet; supports legend and label size variants

interactions.click: FieldLabel click focuses the associated form control

responsive.orientation: The responsive orientation variant stacks vertically by default and switches to horizontal at the @md container breakpoint within FieldGroup

accessibility.keyboardSupport: Tab navigates between form controls; labels are clickable to focus controls
accessibility.screenReader: Labels associated with controls via htmlFor; errors announced via role=alert; FieldSet+FieldLegend provide group context
accessibility.focusManagement: Focus directed to form control via label association

rules: Field wraps exactly one logical control
Labels, descriptions, and errors belong to Field — not to the input primitive
Field controls orientation and grouping semantics
Always use FieldLabel with htmlFor to associate with the form control
Use FieldSet and FieldLegend for grouping related fields (e.g., address, checkboxes)
Use FieldError for validation — do not put validation logic on Input directly

aiHints.context: Default to using Field for every form input. Field provides the label, description, error, and layout structure — the input primitive handles only typing and focus. Use FieldGroup to organize multiple fields with consistent spacing. Use FieldSet + FieldLegend for semantic groupings like checkbox groups or address sections. The responsive orientation variant is especially useful inside FieldGroup, where it leverages container queries.
